websockets

Class WebsocketClientStomp

  • java.lang.Object
    • websockets.WebsocketClientStomp

  • public class WebsocketClientStomp
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Morten Skov Class for creating websocket client connections to a STOMP websocket server.
